post.author: nightquaker
post.body: Hi to all =) i have 2 problems with preditor,first is that Preditor can't load about 80% of textures (also this problem is with DoomEdit,WTF?!) and second is that preditor can't load my map when i want to compile it,i saved this map as test_map,and it can't load it,and when i trying to launch this map in game,it tells me,that it can't find a test_map.map,so,please,help me with this problems =)

post.author: nightquaker
post.body: i have last version of Prey and i completed it without any bugs

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
These unloadable textures are just scraps left by the developers. Use those which can be loaded.

Is your map saved in Prey\base\maps? If it's there, but the game still can't load it, then the problem is in the file access rights in your OS or security software.

Other than this suggestion, I can't help because I've never heard about that problem. I've just renamed a small map to test_map.map, opened it in Preditor, clicked bsp->bsp, then launched it from the game and it worked fine.

post.author: nightquaker
post.body: emm,well,my game is installed od E:\ drive,but there is another prey folder on C:\ drive called Prey,both this folders have base director,but packs are only in E:\Prey\base directory,BTW,this problem is not been in DoomEdit,only in Preditor,but i want to create a map for Prey because i don't very like Doom 3

post.author: NX-317
post.body: If I recall correctly, c:\prey\base is the Preditor's default autosave path. You should save your maps in E:\Prey\base\maps

post.author: nightquaker
post.body: emm,it don't saving any maps in E:\prey\base\maps directory when i trying to save it,well,can you tell me,how you configured your paths in Preditor? i mean,in Project settings tab =)

post.author: nightquaker
post.body: when i saving a map in Editor it saving it in C:\prey\base\maps by default

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
nightquaker wrote:
emm,it don't saving any maps in E:\prey\base\maps

But that's where the maps should go! What error message it shows when you try to save?

As for the project settings tab, I've never bothered to open it. I just hit file->save As and saved my maps in the game's base\maps folder. It has paths "c:\prey...", but I guess it's not a problem for me since I don't have the c:\ drive.

post.author: nightquaker
post.body: yay,i solved this problem =) i changed a main Preditor's base folder,that been on C:\prey\base to E:\prey\base where my game is installed,so,it works now =)

post.author: NX-317
post.body: Good to know . There are very few Prey maps available, so release of a new map would be wonderful.
